item.description:
Let's join the Greater Boston Divorced & Separated and the North Shore Separated / Divorced Support group for this event:

Please join me at the MFA after work on Friday August 24th. This is the late Friday evening till 9.30 pm at the MFA - in the summer it's every weekend in the Calderwood Courtyard with live music and a cash bar.

Los Three (Latin trio), hosted by Regie Gibson will be playing music for your lstening and dancing pleasure. Come and join us for an evening of socializing at the end of a hot work week. Stroll through the museum and enjoy the art or stay and chat with other members of our group.

Free with MFA admission ($25!!) You might be able to get a less expensive ticket at your local library, or through friends who are members.

http://www.mfa.org/programs/special-event/mfa-summer-fridays

Let's meet in the lobby outside the ticket counter at 6:15pm. Please post a photo so we can recognize each other!
item.name: Summer Friday at the MFA. Music, wine, art and socializing.
